divs: sighting detailsthese started showing up 9\24\12 they have been back every night since so far 7 nights i keep track of how many per night,so far friday has the record of 6.they show up around 7:40 until 9 to 9:30ish then head west over san diego in a triangle formation.very bright.come and get some shots of these things. questions 1 taking out trash. 2 after seeing a ufo years ago i always scan the skys, these are so colorful and bright. 3 well lets just say they are not locals. 4 pulsing red blue purple white. 5 what the heck is that!!!!!! 6 they slowly and with no sound move to the west heading for the pacific.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in La Mesa
There were no other sightings in La Mesa on or around September 24th 2012
Summary: {dr}they are here every night come see them bring a good lense and night film
